title: Skins de TF2 para LoL
body:
Encontré esto por ahí:

>Sniper: Caitlyn
>The accents match too! If you think that the skin is too similar to her hunter we can grab Ezrael who forms a >Sniper Rifle instead of a Bow with his ultimate.

>Spy: Shaco
>A tricky dude who runs behind you and shanks you with a knife. Think Shaco in a business suit with a butterfly >knife and a cigarette. He should keep the clown hat and shoes though...

>Pyro: Annie
>While you could use Brand, he already has a Gas Mask skin. I also want to see Mr. Tibbers with in a Gas Mask >with a Fire Axe, Annie could carry a flame thrower that shoots her abilities.

>Engineer: Heimer
>Shaco is sappin' mah sentry!

>Heavy: Sion
>With a bullet belt, and a few barrels coming out of his axe, this one works. Maybe a Sandvich for his shield >somehow?

>Medic: Singed
>Even though he does not heal people, Singed is a sadistic mad scientist whose abilities render him extremely >hard to kill. Both guys are very tall and have a large barrel of strange chemicals on their back.

>Soldier: Tristana
>She already has a rocket jump!

>Scout: Master Yi
>It was between him and Teemo. Both are good here but Teemo has quite a few already.

>Demo: Gragas
>Unless there is another explosive throwing alcoholic in the game I think Gragas takes it here.


El demo y el médico como gragas y singed no me convencen, pero son muy buenas ideas, así que me pregunté si hará skins custom por ahí, pero no encontre nada :( 
si alguien conoce las podría pasar porfa?

replies.body: Y recuerden niños, digan NO a las drogas.
No creo que lo hagan por que quedaría muy raro y aparte igual los podrian denunciar por copiar el tema o algo así
Yo hablo de skins personalizadas. Las oficiales si que serían una mala idea.
Ese Heavy esta mas Duro que Esnifar Arena jajajaja

Yo quiero una Skin de Singed Barman imaginate. 

"Agitado...... pero no revuelto" {{champion:27}}
